title._content: Robert E. Silberglied field notes with drawings of boat

description._content: Creator: Robert E. Silberglied Local number: SIA2012-9801 Summary: Pages 10 and 11 from Robert E. Silberglied's field book from entomological field work conducted on the Galapagos Islands in 1970. He describes travel, collecting and field activities, observations of local culture and customs, and photographs taken. Also included are expenses, itinerary information, rain data charts, and some small sketches. Some sketches show insect nests and tunnels through logs. Several hand-drawn maps of the islands are included throughout. Dates: 1970 Collection: RU 007316, Robert E. Silberglied Papers, 1960-1982, with related materials to 1984; Box 13, Folder 28. Repository: Smithsonian Institution Archives Related blog post: The Mixed-Media Field Books of Robert E. Silberglied View more collections from the Smithsonian Institution.
